author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tamil Nadu Handloom Weavers’ Cooperative Society’s ‘Buy Two, Get One Free’ sale that commenced on February 22 closes on Monday (March 28).

The annual ‘Buy Two, Get One Free’ scheme, which was introduced in 2012, started on February 22 and has evoked excellent response from the public as the offer is applicable to all products right from kerchief to silk saris.

“Since we’ve brought additional stocks that include lightweight silk saris, cotton saris, blankets, bed-spreads, dhotis, towels, readymade shirts, linen shirts etc. for this special sale, the public response is really good. The offer closes on Monday,” said N. Karthikeyan Nair, Regional Manager, Co-Optex, Tirunelveli.

Co-optex’s Tirunelveli region has sold over Rs. 2 crore-worth products during the past 30 days under this special offer alone.
title: Co-Optex offer closes on Monday
